00032 // Definicoes internas:
00033 #define ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_PRIORITY          20
00034 #define ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_STACK                     4096
00035 #define ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_PERIOD_NS         1000000 /* periodo em nanosegundos (1ms) */
00036 
00037 // Prototipos internos:
00038 void robotserver_data_task_handler(void *arg);
00039 
00040 // Variaveis do modulo:
00041 RT_TASK robotserver_camera_task;
00042 RT_TASK robotserver_data_task;
00043 static char quittask = 0;
00044 
00045 /*****************************************************************************
00046 ******************************************************************************
00047 ** Funcoes de inicializacao e encerramento
00048 ******************************************************************************
00049 *****************************************************************************/
00050 
00056 int robotserver_init(void)
00057 {
00058         int status;
00059         
00060         // Cria tarefas
00061         status = rt_task_create(&robotserver_data_task, "robotserver_data_task", ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_STACK, ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_PRIORITY, T_JOINABLE);
00062         if (status != 0) {
00063                 printf("    Criacao do thread 'robotserver_data_task' falhou: ");
00064                 if(status == (-ENOMEM)) printf("-ENOMEM\n");
00065                 if(status == (-EEXIST)) printf("-EEXIST\n");
00066                 if(status == (-EPERM)) printf("-EPERM\n");
00067                 status = rt_task_delete(&robotserver_data_task);
00068                 if (status != 0) {
00069                         printf("    Falha na tentativa de deletar 'robotserver_data_task'.\n");
00070                 }
00071                 return 0;
00072         }
00073         status = rt_task_start(&robotserver_data_task, &robotserver_data_task_handler, NULL);
00074         if (status != 0) {
00075                 printf("    Lancamento do thread 'robotserver_data_task' falhou.\n");
00076                 return 0;
00077         }
00078 
00079         // Retorna 
00080         return 1; 
00081 }                      
00082 
00089 int robotserver_close(void)
00090 {
00091         // Procedimentos de encerramento
00092         quittask = 1;   
00093         rt_task_delete(&robotserver_camera_task);       
00094         rt_task_delete(&robotserver_data_task); 
00095                 
00096         // Retorna 
00097     return 1; 
00098 }

00108 /*****************************************************************************
00109 ******************************************************************************
00110 ** Funcoes internas
00111 ******************************************************************************
00112 *****************************************************************************/
00113 
00119 void robotserver_data_task_handler(void *arg)
00120 {
00121         messsage_t Message;
00122         socketmsg_t SocketMsgStruct;
00123         float varfloat[10];
00124 
00125         // Cria o socket
00126         if( socketmsg_server_init(ROBOTSERVER_PORTNUMBER_DATA, &SocketMsgStruct, ROBOTSERVER_MAXMSGSIZE, 0)==0){
00127                 printf("\n*** Erro em socketmsg_server_init()");
00128                 socketmsg_close(&SocketMsgStruct);
00129                 return;
00130         }
00131 
00132         rt_task_set_periodic(NULL, TM_NOW, ROBOTSERVER_TASK_DATA_PERIOD_NS);
00133 
00134         // A funcao periodica eh executada dentro desse while. 
00135         while(!quittask) {
00136                 // Aguarda proximo instante de execucao
00137                 rt_task_wait_period(NULL);
00138 
00139                 // Aguarda conexão
00140                 while(!socketmsg_server_acceptconnection(&SocketMsgStruct)) {
00141                         // Aguarda proximo instante de execucao
00142                         rt_task_wait_period(NULL);
00143                         if(quittask){
00144                                 if(socketmsg_close(&SocketMsgStruct)==0){
00145                                         printf(" Erro em socketmsg_close()"); 
00146                                 }
00147                                 return;
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150                 
00151                 // Processamento da conexão
00152 //              printf("\n data_task_handler: Processando conexao...");
00153                 while((socketmsg_wait_message(&SocketMsgStruct, &Message)==1) && (!quittask)) {
00154 //                      printf("\n data_task_handler: Mensagem recebida: Message.Header = %X ,  Message.NData = %i",Message.Header,Message.NData); 
00155                         switch(Message.Header){
00156                         case ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_SET_SERVOSMOVE:
00157                                 if(Message.NData == 1){
00158                                         if(robot_set_servos_move(((servomovecommand_t *)(Message.pData[0])))){
00159                                                 // resposta: ACK
00160                                                 Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ACK;
00161                                                 Message.NData = 0;
00162                                         } else{
00163                                                 printf(" robotserver_data_task_handler: robot_set_servos_move retornou com erro (mensagem ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_SET_SERVOSMOVE)"); 
00164                                                 // resposta: ERROR
00165                                                 Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ERROR;
00166                                                 Message.NData = 0;
00167                                         }
00168                                 }
00169                                 else{
00170                                         printf(" robotserver_data_task_handler: Erro no tamanho de dados da mensagem ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_SET_SERVOSMOVE"); 
00171                                         // resposta: ERROR
00172                                         Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ERROR;
00173                                         Message.NData = 0;
00174                                 }
00175                                 break;
00176                         case ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_GET_TIME:
00177                                 if(Message.NData == 0){
00178                                         if(!robot_get_time(&varfloat[0])){
00179                                                 printf(" robotserver_data_task_handler: Erro em robot_get_time()"); 
00180                                                 // resposta: ERROR
00181                                                 Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ERROR;
00182                                                 Message.NData = 0;
00183                                         } 
00184                                         else{
00185                                                 // resposta: ACK + varfloat[0]
00186                                                 Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ACK;
00187                                                 Message.pData[0] = (unsigned char *)&varfloat[0];
00188                                                 Message.DataSizes[0] = sizeof(float);
00189                                                 Message.NData = 1;
00190                                         }
00191                                 }
00192                                 else{
00193                                         printf(" robotserver_data_task_handler: Erro no tamanho de dados da mensagem ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_GET_TIME"); 
00194                                         // resposta: ERROR
00195                                         Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ERROR;
00196                                         Message.NData = 0;
00197                                 }
00198                                 break;
00199                         default: // funcao nao conhecida. reportar erro.
00200                                         // resposta: ERROR
00201                                         Message.Header = ROBOTPROTOCOL_MSGHEADER_ERROR;
00202                                         Message.NData = 0;
00203                                 break;
00204                         }
00205                         socketmsg_send_message(&SocketMsgStruct, &Message);
00206 
00207                         // Aguarda proximo instante de execucao
00208                         rt_task_wait_period(NULL);
00209                 }
00210 
00211                 // Fecha conexão
00212                 close(SocketMsgStruct.clientsocketfd);
00213         }
00214         
00215         // Destroi o socket
00216         if(socketmsg_close(&SocketMsgStruct)==0){
00217                 printf(" Erro em socketmsg_close()"); 
00218         }
00219 }
